#include <cstdio>
#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include <map>

int main()
{
        typedef std::map<long long, long long> M;
        typedef std::map<long long, long long>::const_iterator MCI;
        int t;
        scanf("%d", &t);
        int n;
        int k;
        long long s = 0;
        long long res = 0;
        MCI it;
        std::map<long long, long long> m;
        std::vector<long long> v(100001, 0);
        for (long long i = 0; i < t; ++i) {
                scanf("%d", &n);
                s = 0;
                m.clear();
                for (long long j = 0; j < n; ++j) {
                        scanf("%d", &k);
                        s += k; 
                        v[j] = k;
                        ++m[s];
                }
                
                if (s % 2 != 0) {
                        printf("%d\n", 0);
                        continue;
                }
                s /= 2;
                res = 0;

                long long tmp = 0;
                for (long long p = 0; p < n; ++p) {
                        tmp += v[p];
                        --m[tmp];
                        s += v[p];
                        it = m.find(s);
                        if (it != m.end()) {
                                res += it->second;
                        }
                }
                std::cout << res << std::endl;

        }
        return 0;
}
